name: Moncom [pre-alpha]
description:
Moncom is a monster befriending game where you and your chosen friends head off on an adventure. Each Moncom has it's own special and often unique abillities. Your job is to use these to navigate the Mocomia world and make the world a better palce for those around you.

This is very early days, and not much gameplay is completed. Once you have completed the initial portion you will be informed. Please check back soon.
